text:
@maddow #COVID19 marinade:

1/2 cup bleach/lysol 
1/4 cup Worcestershire
3 tbl spoons liquid smoke
Juice from 1/2 a lime
2 tbl spoons kosher salt
1 tbl spoon fresh ground pepper
1 teaspoon garlic salt
1 lb choice cut of meat

Refrigerate overnight then throw it all in the trash
